name: Fill All Inputs Test
description: Verify that all input fields on the page can be filled with valid data.
preconditions: The page at http://localhost:3000/ must contain various input fields (text, number, email, password, date, etc.).
steps: 1. Open the browser and go to 'http://localhost:3000/'
2. Locate the 'Name' input field and enter a valid name (e.g., 'John Doe').
3. Locate the 'Email' input field and enter a valid email address (e.g., 'john.doe@example.com').
4. Locate the 'Password' input field and enter a valid password (e.g., 'P@sswOrd123').
5. After filling all of the input fields close the agent.
expected_result: All input fields are successfully filled with valid data, and the data is submitted without any errors. A success message is displayed (if applicable).
